panels.title: Number of signatures created by Key ID

targets.expr:
label_replace (quantile by (ic_subnet) (
    0.5, rate((sum by (ic_subnet, instance) (replicated_state_threshold_signature_agreements_total{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance", key_id=~"$key_id"} != 0)[$__rate_interval:5s]))),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)
